summary: "Alien vs. Predator" (2004) is a sci-fi action horror film where humans get caught in a battle between Aliens and Predators, creatures from two popular movie series. Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson, the movie stars Sanaa Lathan and Raoul Bova. It's based on a comic book idea from 1989 and combines elements from both franchises. The story follows scientists trying to escape an ancient pyramid during the fight. Despite negative reviews, it made $177.4 million worldwide. A sequel, "Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem," came out in 2007.
title: Alien vs. Predator (film)
